Class AbstractDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
DataAccess.AbstractDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of entity this DAO handles
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientDAO, OrdersDAO, ProductDAO
public class AbstractDAO<T> extends Object
Abstract Data Access Object (DAO) class providing generic CRUD operations for entities. Implements basic database operations using reflection to work with any entity type.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bud Vasile-Stefan

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      public List<T> findAll()
      Retrieves all records of type T from the database.
      Returns:
      List of all records, or null if error occurs

    • findById

      public T findById(int id)
      Finds a record by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID to search for
      Returns:
      The found record, or null if not found

      Inserts a new record into the database.
      Parameters:
      t - The object to insert
      Returns:
      The inserted object with generated ID
